snippet: A police officer who arrested a woman who later was found hanged in her cell has been placed on desk duty after a preliminary review by the state.
abstract: Police officer in Prairie View, Tex, is placed on desk duty after department finds that officer, who has not been named, violated procedures for traffic stops in arrest of Sandra Bland, who was later found dead in jail cell; death was ruled suicide but Bland's family contends local police had role.
lead_paragraph: A police officer who arrested a woman who later was found hanged in her cell has been placed on desk duty after a preliminary review by the state.

headline.main: Texas: Officer Placed on Desk Duty After Woman Is Found Dead in Cell
headline.print_headline: Texas: Officer Placed on Desk Duty After Woman Is Found Dead in Cell
